article.author: hanns
article.title: Dodge Caliber Review
article.text:
Dodge Caliber
The 2012 Dodge Caliber SXT style is a flexible, all-around entertainer with something for everyone. The Quality SXT is a comfortable, safe car that is fun to generate and is different from the competition. The SXT model’s conventional characteristics include the conventional characteristics of the SE style, as well as CVT2, four-wheel anti-lock dvd braking system, 17-inch metal tires, visiting revocation, tachometer, interior removable/rechargeable torch, Sirius XM satellite radio, front side fog lights, car owner chair level insurance adjuster, fold-flat front side traveler chair and a rear 60/40 fold-flat lying chair.
Dodge Caliber
The Dodge Caliber is available in the following outside colors:Black Clear Coat, Bright White Clear Coat, Bright Silver Metallic Clear Coat, Redline 2 Pearl Coat and Tungsten Metallic Clear Coat.
